title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.24 - Discontinuance of actions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 207.24 - Discontinuance of actions

State Regulations

In any discontinued action or proceeding, the
attorney for the plaintiff or petitioner shall file a stipulation or statement
of discontinuance with the clerk of the court within 20 days of such
discontinuance. If the action or proceeding has been noticed for judicial
activity within 20 days of such discontinuance, the stipulation or statement
shall be filed before the date scheduled for such activity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
207.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
